column2: ENGLISH

With the new Hyrulean rulers the Sarians of [Root.GetName] have stoped speaking Saria and started speaking Hylian. With each passing generation the number of children with rounded ears decrease and those with hylian ears increases.
They are West Hyruleans now.

With the new Hyrulean rules the Kasutons of [Root.GetName] have stopped speaking Kasuto and started speaking Hylian. With each passing generation the number of children with rounded ears decrease and those with hylian ears increases.
They are East Hyruleans now
As the Hyrulean population becomes more entranched they begin adopting an accent similar to their northern neighbors.
They are Little Hyruleans now.

There was a recent panic as instead of zora tadpoles, children are born with the look of humans with bird like beaks. Some of the populace claim it is a blessing from Valoo and others claim it is a curse by the water spirits.
We will call these new creatures after the Zora word for bird, Rito.
These creatures are surely Valoo's chosen people.

There was a recent panic as the tadpoles developed in the shallow rivers of [Root.GetName] developed in to large scaled creatures. These children have proven to be more violent than other Zora. So far the residents have started calling them Zola after an ancient evil water spirit.
These children will surely replace the old Zora.

There was a recent confusion as the zora tadpoles that developed in the salty waters and air started to develope into red skinned and brightly colored zora. Other than their coloring they seem to be the same as other zoras.
They are Sea Zoras now

The citizens of Port Town and the isles are not of HoHo ancestry anymore, but now of almost everyland that we trade with. As any walk through town we are not greeted with hundreds of languages but one made of hundreds.
Yes this will help with trade.

Around the islands more people use this Port language and it helps us converse with citizens from a hundred lands. We continue to use our influence to promote this means of communication for most who we do business.
We are wise

Although every civilized being in Hyrule know Hylian is the true language of communication, this new Port language does have functionality. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday use.
A most useful development

I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my holdings I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running business.
Sometimes I event surprise myself.
My liege has persuaded me to embrace this notion of Portness that is sweeping the realm.
This will surely be profitable.

As the Morians in the Grindle lands settle and adapt to their new terrain most of defenders find that the horse is far more useful than their traditional long bows. Many of the commoners prefer to teach their sons and daughters to ride the horse than aim the bow and some even ridicule those that still use the long bow that for centuries have kept us safe from the monstrous hordes.
They are not true Morians!
The old ways are of no use.
They are Grindles now

The locals of [Root.GetName] have been in a panic after children recently have been born not as tadpoles but as human like children with beaks. The locals are blamming the mountain air and mineral rich water.
The locals have taken to calling them Rito after the zora word for bird.

The locals of [Root.GetName] have stopped considering themselves Hyruleans and prefer calling themselves New Hyruleans. While they still speak Hylian their alphebet has changed and they have adopted strange fashion and accents.
They are New Hyruleans now.

The locals of [Root.GetName] have stopped considering themselves Cobble and prefer calling themselves Papuchians. They dress in strange clothes and have started speaking a dialect that sounds like the local Lokomo language and Hylian combined.
They have abandoned the perfect culture for.
Imp In The Garden
Twili In The Garden
As I walk through the garden at dusk the movement of something in the bushes catches my eye.
Call the guards
Get a close look.
It must be my mind playing tricks on me

Something dark appears out of the corner of my eye right as the guards round the corner and into the creature. After a brief strugle the guards drag a short hidous creature with glowing hair and lines accross it's body. The thing quickly explains that it was cursed and banished by a cruel ruler from a land of eternal twilight.
Throw it in a cell for questioning.
Offer shelter.
Get rid of it.
The guards arrive within seconds and quickly search the bush and every one around it, but report not finding anything.
As I approach the bush I hear a rustle noise. A weak voice speaks out and explains that it was cursed and banished by a cruel king from a land far away.
You may stay in my court till you can return.
Leave now and you will face no repercussions.

Something dark appears out of the corner of my eye right as the guards round the corner and into the creature. After a brief strugle the guards drag a short hidous creature with glowing hair and lines accross it's body.

As I was retireing from the throne room a pair of guards entered unannounced escorting a robed woman. The guards explain that she was found attempting to enter through the main gates and refused to leave without talking to me.
She can talk to the dungeoun master.
Go on.
Not interested.

The woman explains that she is a princess from a land not on any map because of a neighboring kingdom conquering her kingdom. She goes on to say she has been hiding in my land with some guardians but they have been slowly killed by the inhabitants and now has no other place to seek shelter.
She may stay in my kingdom till she can return to her homeland.
You neighbor would pay to have you back.
You may stay and recover but must leave when you can.

As I was sureveying my demesne me and my party came across the scene of a fierce battle, six men in bizzare armor each surrounded by scores of bokoblin corpses and the remains of another man similarly dressed near a woman. Upon closer inspection by my party's healer she informs me that the man guarding the woman is still breathing but barely, he needs a potion immediatly or he will perish.
Make his passing as painless as possible.
Use my red potion.
Use my blue potion.
Use my bottled fairy.
This is none of our business.

With the healers care the man recovered enough to talk, he revealed that his party is from a land not on the maps that had been conquered by it's neighbor they were escorting the surviving princess before being attacked by the Bokoblins. He asked after the princess's health and upon learning of her fate was in no condition to talk.
See that he recovers before sending him on his way.
Offer him a place in my court when he recovers.
We have done enough for him.
The healer reported that the man had passed before he did he asked if the princess was uninjured, he assumed the woman was who he was asking, the healer said that he told him she was.
I hope he finds peace.

As I was sureveying my demesne me and my party came across the scene of a fierce battle, six men in bizzare armor each surrounded by scores of bokoblin corpses and the remains of another man similarly dressed near a woman. Upon closer inspection by my party's healer she informs me that the man and woman are both living but if he tries to help both they will probably both die as he does not have enough red potion for two and the one he doesn't help will die.
Help the man.
Help the woman.
Help both.
Thanks to the healer the man survived he explained that he and is brothers were sent to this world to find shelter for their princess.
Despite the healers help the man passed away his last words were to ask if the princess was ok.
Thanks to the healer the woman survives she explains that she and her knights were driven from their homes by a warlike neighbor.
Despite the healers help the woman passed away her last words were to aski if her knights were ok.
The healer explains that he can split the potion but the chances of them both living is slim, unless I have another potion then he could give it to the woman.
Nevermind, help the man.
Nevermind, help the woman.
Give both half.

Both recover enough to talk after a brief reunion the woman explains that she is a princess from a land far away, but do to turmoil in her homelands it is no longer safe for her so they came to this land in hopes of finding shelter. Both give their gratituted and are both eternally gratefull for you hope.
See that they are well taken care of till they recover fully.
They both could stay at my court till it is safe to return to their homeland.
They can take care of themselves now.
The healer explains that he is sorry to say that he could not save them but they were able live long enough to talk before they passed.
I hope they find peace.
As I was surveying a river in my demesne a splash and a call for help came from the river. A several feet into the deeper parts of the river is a child struggling to stay afloat and calling for help.
Before I know what is happening I find myself diving into the river and heading to the child.
Before I know what is happening one of the scouts is diving into the river and swimming to the child.

As the child is dragged to the river it starts coughing and getting in a gulp of air. The child explains that it was traveling with their flock when they hit a downgust and could only try to land into the river instead of the ground.
You may stay and recover till your flock returns.
I'll see that you find a good home till your flock returns.
As I reach the child and start swimming back to shore I find myself struggling to keep my head above water.
I will not leave the child behind!
I'm sorry.
As I sink under the surface I see the child plucked from the water. My vision starts to fade as the water invades my lungs as the panic sets in. My last thoughts is at least the child will live.
It is a good death.

As I stand in the forge the heat from the furnaces and the ringing of metal on metal. When I start making my armor the fortress will guide me through the process. Of course I can always pay him to make the armor for me.
It's time to start
I'll pay him to make it

As I stand over my finished suit of armor the final step in making the armor is decoration. Traditionally the armor is simply given ones Legion icon or their house icon, or personal icon on the chest. Some add prayers or sayings in Darknut along the edges of the pauldroms and headcrest.The last step is almost never done by the original forger and either done by an artistan or skilled smith. The only question is if I have any words added to my armor.
It is perfect as is
I'll have the goddesses names on my armor edges
I'll have the codes on the edges
I'll have the names of my parents and grandparents on the edge.
I stand in the forge pondering what form my weapon should take. A sword is the traditional weapon but a mace is an acceptable weapon.
The Sword
The Sword and someone else will make it
The Mace
The Mace and someone else will make it
I stand over my finished sword, it is tradition to decorate the center with writing, usually the owners name or family name.
My name will be enough
I'll have Din's name enscribed on it
I'll have my favorite code enscribed
I am awoken in the morning to a suddent yell of "Hey! Wake Up!" and find a fairy floating above me.
column3: Je réveillé le matin pour un cri suddent de " Hey ! Wake Up! " et de trouver une fée flottant au-dessus de moi.
column4: Ich bin am Morgen zu einem suddent Schrei aufgewacht "Hey! Wach auf! " und finden Sie eine Fee über mir schweben.
column6: Me despertaron en la mañana a un grito suddent de " Hey ! Wake Up ! " y encontrar un hada flotando por encima de mí .

column2: Does this mean I finally have a fairy friend!?
column3: Est- ce que cela signifie que j'ai enfin un ami de fées !?
column4: Heißt das, ich habe endlich eine Fee Freund !?
column6: ¿Esto significa que por fin tengo un amigo de hadas !?

column2: My ward came running into my chambers trailed by fairy. They explained that they were finally chosen by a fairy.
column3: Mon service est arrivé en courant dans mes chambres traînées par fée. Ils ont expliqué qu'ils ont finalement été choisis par une fée .
column4: Meine Station kam mir in den Kammern von Fee schleppte läuft. Sie erklärten, dass sie von einer Fee schließlich ausgewählt wurden.
column6: Mi barrio entró corriendo en mis cámaras perdían por hadas. Explicaron que finalmente fueron elegidos por un hada .

column2: They are truly favored by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
I stand in the market square seeing multiple stalls, many so crowded that I can't see the seller or what they are selling, and others with a collection of produce.
I need to find the potion maker.
I need to find the general store.
I need to find a good tailor.
I need to find.....a guy.
I'm better off saving my money.
As I walk in I see the owner, an elderly woman stroking a small tiger. "Oh Dearie are you here for some of my potions or some stories." she asks looking up at me.
What is the red potion for?
What is the blue potion for?
What is the green potion for?
Sorry Dearie but it looks like you don't have any empty bottles.
Sorry, I'm just browsing.
The red potion is good for healing minor wounds and ilnesses, though some good soup from granny can cure anything.
I'll take it.
Sorry, but I don't have enough rupees.
Maybe something else.
The blue potion is used to restore your magic power and heal minor wounds.
The green potion is used to restore your magic power.
As I walk in I see the owner standing behind the counter, a large brawny man with a bushy beard wearing a leather vest. "Welcome are you looking to buy or just looking?"
It is a bow, you shoot stuff with it.
It is a bag full of bombs. You can use it to clear obstacles and crack open some of the harder monsters out there.
It is a fairy in a bottle. If you release it, it can heal most serious injuries and illnesses.
I stand in the quartermaster rotunda. The ringing of a metal on metal coming from one room, the smell of alcohol coming from another, and the moaning of wounded coming from another.
I'll go to the medic.
I'll go to the armorer.
As you walk past the stretchers, some empty and some occupied, you find a man in white robes with a red sword entwined by a sandworm. "If you can walk in then you just need some medicine."
Do you have any red potion?
Do you have any fairies?
I do. There is some over in the jugs. It can heal most of your minor wounds on the battlefield. A jar full will be 10 rupees.
I do. They're in the chest over there. When released it can heal most serious wounds. Just don't release it if you aren't hurt or else it might help your enemy. One will be 50 rupees.

I walk into the armorer's room the heat is almost like a volcano. Among the various Darknut working at the forges there is the oldest man walking around and inspecting the other's work, until he approaches me. "Do you need to use a forge or are you here to commision something?"
I'd like some armor.
I'd like a sword.
I'd like some bombs.
Did you lose your sword? A darknut sword will cost you 100 rupees.
Do you need replacement armor or did you decide you couldn't make your own? A suit of darknut forged armor will cost you 50 rupees. Though you can always make your own.
Are you somekind of a sapper? You can use them to bring down walls of crack open some of the armored monsters out there, if you can't break them open with a mace.

As I stand in the market square I see an assortment of stalls and shops. There are several stalls surrounded by women making it impossible to see, other stalls with old produce. You see a jar shapped building and a large covered area.

I enter the potion maker's jar shapped building with several vats infront of a counter. The potion maker is an old woman with a pronounced sloach. "If you are looking for my sister she's out gathering ingrediants. If you need potions step up."
The red potion is mostly used for healing wounds, but it can be used to cure a cold. It's almost always out of stock so that'll be 20 rupees.
The blue potion does what both the green and blue potions do. It'll cost you 30 rupees.
The green potion is used to restore your magic. Because of that almost no one buys it.

You enter the shaded area seeing several gerudo women and a couple of men carrying containers in and out. A burly woman stands in the center yelling orders at a young man, as she notices you she approaches to impromptu counter. "Welcome to the Aveil and daughters trading Co, if you can't get it here you can't get it in any gerudo market and no I'm not Aveil."
How much is the Bow and Ice Arrows?

Good choice the arrows are made by one of my daughters, I don't remember which one. You can use it freeze guards in their tracks, I also hear from one of my sisters that it is good for freezing some of the more fiery monsters.
I see you don't want to die. These are from a fairy spring nearby, family secret, they can heal most major wounds and can cure some curses.

So are you planning on breaking into some place, we also fence. You can break open those pesky doors or according to one of my cousins can break open some hard shelled monsters. A bag of them will set you back 50 rupees.
As I stand in the market cavern I see an assortment of counters with rocks and ores, from one corridor I hear the ringing of metal on metal, and one corridor with a sign for "General Store".
As I enter the general store I see the shopkeeper leaning againt the stone counter. "Hey Brother, are you looking to buy?"
Traders frequently bring us red potions, we don't usually sell very many of it so, I'll give you a discount, bringing your total to 10 rupees.
Goron specil bag of bombs, you can use them to mine some tasty rocks or get rid of those pesky dodongos.
As I enter the the forge I see a large goron taking up most of the room. "Welcome I mostly make stuff for the warriors, but I always have extra equipment laying around."
What's that large sword?
That's a knife for a Biggoron, but he doesn't really use them very much.
What is that set of armor?
That's a set of Wizzrobe made Magic Armor. It'll protect you from almost any form of attack.
The Knights of Hyrule

The armies of Hyrule can barely protect itself from the monsterous hordes and the Gerudo raiders. It is time to form an organization to protect Holy Hyrule much like the aerborne knights of Legend defended the last of the Hylians during the time that gods walked the earth. They will be the Knights of Hyrule and will never falter.
Let the world see the Glory of Hyrule.

Unable to with stand the monsterous hordes and desert raiders the Kingdom of Hyrule has formed the Knights of Hyrule and calls all able bodies who wish to protect the kingdom founded by the Goddesses.
May Hyrule never fall.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me and said that they have decided to join the Knights of Hyrule! While [From.GetTitledFirstName] will gain fame, fortune, and experience leading the perils will match protecting Hyrule from the thieving gerudos and the creature's of Demise.
I will not allow it!
Go [From.GetTitledFirstName] follow the will of the Goddesses and make me proud.

A post man from Hyrule arrived today bearing a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], it says that he has fallen in love with a woman from Hyrule and left the Knighthood. He expresses that he is sorry to say that he will not be returning to Hyrule as he and his wife wishes to make a name for themselves in Hyrule.
My boy...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has finished his term of service in the Knights of Hyrule, but his wife convinced him that he should stay in Hyrule. So [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be staying in Hyrule to lend me service if needed.
Very well.

A knight arrive to your caste wearing a full plate armor, the knight quickly disarms your guards and steps up to your throne, but instead drawing their sword the remove their helm revealing it to be [From.GetTitledFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName]! You've... changed!
[From.GetFirstName] has returned home from Hyrule while looking the same as before you can tell that they are not the same person as before.
No matter, I'm just glad he made it home!
column3: Ça ne fait rien, son retour me fait grand plaisir !
column4: Egal, hauptsache er ist wieder da!
column6: ¡No importa, sólo estoy feliz de que esté de vuelta en casa!

column2: A frail robed figure into your throne room, the guards explain that it was seized trying to enter the room and couldn't get anything out of it other than your name. The figure shakingly reveals it's face to be that of [From.GetFirstName].
Oh Gods [From.GetFirstName], what have they done to you.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from the Knights of Hyrule, but not alone he has come with a Hyrulean woman, while she misses her home in Castle Town she in exited to meet her new family.
Each to their own.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from Hyrule with tales of battles against a hundred different forms of monsters and horros.
Tell me of your battles!

Three Knights of Hyrule entered the throne room, the express their condolences as the tell me that [From.GetFirstName] fell in battle while defending castle town from a band of Bokoblin. The appologise that they could not recover enough of the remains for transport.
[From.GetFirstName] died a hero...
[From.GetFirstName] returned home with a giant wallet filled with rupees, claiming to have been awarded it for outstanding services in defense of Castle Town.
[From.GetFirstName] you've made me proud.
Upon learning of my father's death I left for home. My wallet filled with rupees and letter from the king of Hyrule thanking me for my service and expressing his condolences for my lost.
I'm home.
The Knights of Cobble

Faced with the threats of the expansionist Zuna to the east, the blood thirst Yook to the south, and monstrous pirates threaten Cobble have proven that the armies of Cobble are inefective and it is for these reasons that the King of Cobble forms the Knights of Cobble
Let the world see the Glory of Cobble.
The King of Cobble have declared his armies incompetant against the his enemies and has declared that he is forming the Knights of Cobble to defend against Cobble's enemies.
I hope it helps..

[From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me and said that they have decided to join the Knights of Cobble! While [From.GetTitledFirstName] will gain fame, fortune, and experience leading the perils will match protecting Cobble from the Yook.
I will not allow it!
Go [From.GetTitledFirstName] follow your desires and make me proud.

A post man from Cobble arrived today bearing a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], it says that he has fallen in love with a woman from Cobble and left the Knighthood. He expresses that he is sorry to say that he will not be returning to Cobble as he and his wife wishes to make a name for themselves in Cobble.
My boy...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has finished his term of service in the Knights of Cobble, but his wife convinced him that he should stay in Cobble. So [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be staying in Cobble to lend me service if needed.
Very well.

A knight arrive to your castle wearing a strange set of armor, the knight quickly disarms your guards and steps up to your throne, but instead drawing their sword the remove their helm revealing it to be [From.GetTitledFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName]! You've... changed!
[From.GetFirstName] has returned home from Cobble while looking the same as before you can tell that they are not the same person as before.
No matter, I'm just glad he made it home!
column3: Ça ne fait rien, son retour me fait grand plaisir !
column4: Egal, hauptsache er ist wieder da!
column6: ¡No importa, sólo estoy feliz de que esté de vuelta en casa!

column2: A frail robed figure into your throne room, the guards explain that it was seized trying to enter the room and couldn't get anything out of it other than your name. The figure shakingly reveals it's face to be that of [From.GetFirstName].
Oh Gods [From.GetFirstName], what have they done to you.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from the Knights of Cobble, but not alone he has come with a Cobble woman, while she misses her home in Castle Town she in exited to meet her new family.
Each to their own.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from Cobble with tales of battles against a hundred different forms of monsters and horros.
Tell me of your battles!

Three Knights of Cobble entered the throne room, the express their condolences as the tell me that [From.GetFirstName] fell in battle while fighting a nomad band of Zuna. They appologise that they could not recover enough of the remains for transport.
[From.GetFirstName] died a hero...
[From.GetFirstName] returned home with a giant wallet filled with rupees, claiming to have been awarded it for outstanding services in defense of Monument Mountain.
[From.GetFirstName] you've made me proud.
Upon learning of my father's death I left for home. My wallet filled with rupees and letter from the king of Cobble thanking me for my service and expressing his condolences for my lost.
I'm home.
The Rivermen of Saria

The armies of Saria have been found wanting against the Moblin to the north and the Bokoblin raiders to the south. It is for this reason that the Rivermen of Saria have been founded to face the threats against Saria whether it comes from sea or land.
Let the world see the Saria is strong.
Faced with monsterous hordes from both sea and land the Kingdom of Saria has formed the Rivermen to face invaders no matter where they come from.
It won't help..

[From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me and said that they have decided to join the Rivermen! While [From.GetTitledFirstName] will gain fame, fortune, and experience leading the perils will match protecting Saria from the Yook.
I will not allow it!
Go [From.GetTitledFirstName] follow your desires and make me proud.

A post man from Saria arrived today bearing a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], it says that he has fallen in love with a woman from Saria and left the Knighthood. He expresses that he is sorry to say that he will not be returning to Saria as he and his wife wishes to make a name for themselves in Saria.
My boy...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has finished his term of service in the Rivermen, but his wife convinced him that he should stay in Saria. So [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be staying in Saria to lend me service if needed.
Very well.

A warrior arrive to your castle wearing a mailed set, the man quickly disarms your guards and steps up to your throne, but instead drawing their sword the remove their helm revealing it to be [From.GetTitledFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName]! You've... changed!
[From.GetFirstName] has returned home from Saria while looking the same as before you can tell that they are not the same person as before.
No matter, I'm just glad he made it home!
column3: Ça ne fait rien, son retour me fait grand plaisir !
column4: Egal, hauptsache er ist wieder da!
column6: ¡No importa, sólo estoy feliz de que esté de vuelta en casa!

column2: A frail robed figure into your throne room, the guards explain that it was seized trying to enter the room and couldn't get anything out of it other than your name. The figure shakingly reveals it's face to be that of [From.GetFirstName].
Oh Gods [From.GetFirstName], what have they done to you.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from the Rivermen, but not alone he has come with a Saria woman, while she misses her home in Saria she in exited to meet her new family.
Each to their own.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from Saria with tales of battles against a hundred different forms of monsters and horros.
Tell me of your battles!

Three Rivermen entered the throne room, the express their condolences as the tell me that [From.GetFirstName] fell in battle while fighting on the beaches against a horde of Moblin. They apologize that the could not find his remains as it was swept out to sea.
[From.GetFirstName] died a hero...
[From.GetFirstName] returned home with a giant wallet filled with rupees, claiming to have been awarded it for outstanding services in defense of Monument Mountain.
[From.GetFirstName] you've made me proud.
Upon learning of my father's death I left for home. My wallet filled with rupees and letter from the king of Saria thanking me for my service and expressing his condolences for my lost.
I'm home.
The Knights of Greater Hyrule

Faced with threats from Moblins pirates to the north, Bokoblin raiders to the south, and the perpetual bickering of nobles the King of Hyrule forms the Knight of Hyrule to be deployed against the threats both internal and external.
Long Live Hyrule.
The king of Hyrule has declared the nobles to dishonorble to face the threats of the external enemies and so has formed his own private army to face the threats and keep the nobles in line.
Fools, fighting amongst themselves..

[From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me and said that they have decided to join the Knights of Greater Hyrule! While [From.GetTitledFirstName] will gain fame, fortune, and experience leading the perils will match protecting Greater Hyrule from the Yook.
I will not allow it!
Go [From.GetTitledFirstName] follow your desires and make me proud.

A post man from Greater Hyrule arrived today bearing a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], it says that he has fallen in love with a woman from Greater Hyrule and left the Knighthood. He expresses that he is sorry to say that he will not be returning to Greater Hyrule as he and his wife wishes to make a name for themselves in Greater Hyrule.
My boy...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has finished his term of service in the Knights of Greater Hyrule, but his wife convinced him that he should stay in Greater Hyrule. So [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be staying in Greater Hyrule to lend me service if needed.
Very well.

A knight arrive to your castle wearing a set of full plate armor, the knight quickly disarms your guards and steps up to your throne, but instead drawing their sword the remove their helm revealing it to be [From.GetTitledFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName]! You've... changed!
[From.GetFirstName] has returned home from Greater Hyrule while looking the same as before you can tell that they are not the same person as before.
No matter, I'm just glad he made it home!
column3: Ça ne fait rien, son retour me fait grand plaisir !
column4: Egal, hauptsache er ist wieder da!
column6: ¡No importa, sólo estoy feliz de que esté de vuelta en casa!

column2: A frail robed figure into your throne room, the guards explain that it was seized trying to enter the room and couldn't get anything out of it other than your name. The figure shakingly reveals it's face to be that of [From.GetFirstName].
Oh Gods [From.GetFirstName], what have they done to you.

[From.GetFirstName] has returned from the Knights of Greater Hyrule, but not alone he has come with a Greater Hyrule woman, while she misses her home in Castle Town she in exited to meet her new family.
Each to their own.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from Greater Hyrule with tales of battles against a hundred different forms of monsters and horros.
Tell me of your battles!

Three Knights of Greater Hyrule entered the throne room, the express their condolences as the tell me that [From.GetFirstName] was poisoned by a petty noble when he found out [From.GetFirstName] would not take his bribes. They appologise that they could not capture the noble as he had fled for Gamelon before the body was found.
[From.GetFirstName] died a hero...
[From.GetFirstName] returned home with a giant wallet filled with rupees, claiming to have been awarded it for outstanding services in defense of Monument Mountain.
[From.GetFirstName] you've made me proud.
Upon learning of my father's death I left for home. My wallet filled with rupees and letter from the king of Greater Hyrule thanking me for my service and expressing his condolences for my lost.
I'm home.
The Questing Knights of Moria

After centuries of strugle the men of the Moria mountains have founded their kingdom, but the light of hope is still faint. The king of Moria declares that all who wish to spread the spark of hope across the world may join the Questing Knights.
Let hope spread across the world.
The king of Moria have formed the Questing Knights of Moria in hopes of spreading good deeds and Morian culture across the world..
Curse those nefarious mountain dwellers..

[From.GetTitledFirstName] came to me and said that they have decided to join the Knights of Moria! While [From.GetTitledFirstName] will gain fame, fortune, and experience leading the perils will match protecting Moria from the Yook.
I will not allow it!
Go [From.GetTitledFirstName] follow your desires and make me proud.

A post man from Moria arrived today bearing a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], it says that he has fallen in love with a woman from Moria and left the Knighthood. He expresses that he is sorry to say that he will not be returning to Moria as he and his wife wishes to make a name for themselves in Moria.
My boy...

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has finished his term of service in the Knights, but his wife convinced him that he should stay in Moria. So [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be staying in Moria to lend me service if needed.
Very well.

A knight arrive to your castle wearing a set of full plate, the man quickly disarms your guards and steps up to your throne, but instead drawing their sword the remove their helm revealing it to be [From.GetTitledFirstName].
[From.GetFirstName]! You've... changed!
[From.GetFirstName] has returned home from Moria while looking the same as before you can tell that they are not the same person as before.
No matter, I'm just glad he made it home!
column3: Ça ne fait rien, son retour me fait grand plaisir !
column4: Egal, hauptsache er ist wieder da!
column6: ¡No importa, sólo estoy feliz de que esté de vuelta en casa!

column2: A frail robed figure into your throne room, the guards explain that it was seized trying to enter the room and couldn't get anything out of it other than your name. The figure shakingly reveals it's face to be that of [From.GetFirstName].
Oh Gods [From.GetFirstName], what have they done to you.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from the Knights of Moria, but not alone he has come with a Moria woman, while she misses her home in Moria she in exited to meet her new family.
Each to their own.
[From.GetFirstName] has returned from Moria with tales of battles against a hundred different forms of monsters and horros.
Tell me of your battles!

Three Knights entered the throne room, the express their condolences as the tell me that [From.GetFirstName] fell in battle while defending a farm from a band of Bulblins. They apologize that they could not transport the remains and instead left it overlooking the farm he gave his life defending.
[From.GetFirstName] died a hero...
[From.GetFirstName] returned home with a giant wallet filled with rupees, claiming to have been awarded it for outstanding services in defense of Morian Ideas.
[From.GetFirstName] you've made me proud.
Upon learning of my father's death I left for home. My wallet filled with rupees and letter from the king of Moria thanking me for my service and expressing his condolences for my lost.
I'm home.
My Prisoner has a piece of the triforce. The power that I can obtain.
As I leave my child's cries follow me. The Arbiter explains that if the child is strong they will survive and overcome their weakness. If not then their very existance will bring suffering.
Codes let them overcome their weakness.
No, it is better to overcome the weakness they are born with.
As the adults left I was left alone. By the night the cold is unberable.
I'll just close my eyes for a second.

The Arbiters returned the next morning with the body of my child. They say he died during the night. They offer to give him a full warriors funeral, as is custom, and add them to the list of the fallen.
Codes I hope they didn't suffer.

As I near the gate for my fortress my legion stands at attention. I am ready for my Last Battle I will die as a on my feet with a sword in my hand and armor on my chest. The only question is where will I die.
The Mountains, the yeti, the wolfos, or the Aerolfos will kill me.
The Deserts, to face our enemy of old.
The Forests, to teach the bokoblin fear.
The Plains, to carve a  path through the cavalry.

I've been searching the mountain for days. After days I've found 3 battlefields. A cave which I have witnessed wolfos wandering in and out and strewn with bones, a peak higher up which I have seen aerolfos patrolling, and what looks like a set of snow covered roofs.
Wolfos will surely give me a warriors death.
The Yeti are the superior foe. If they can't kill me nothing will.
The Aerolfos may be weak but they are cunning.

The Wolfos were upon me before I event got half way to the cave. I defeated the first wave, then second, then third, it was only when the Alphas of the pack set upon me. Before I knew it my chest plate fell from me. The alpha male was on my throat before I could draw my back up sword.
A good death.

As I approach the Yeti village I hear a choras of roars and what sounds like an avalanche and see a cloud of snow. As the snow clears a see an array of large yeti. The leader step forward and pounds his club in the snow before charging.
For the Legion and the Exemplar!

I meet the lead warrior head on. My shield absorbs his first hit and my first strike disables him. My next strike brings his bodyguard to his knees. By before I can strike again a hit rings off of my helmet. As I try to get back on my feet one of the warriors brings his club down on me.

I meet the lead warrior head on. My shield absorbs his first hit but shatters my wooden limb. He brings his club down again knocking me to the ground. As the warrior raises his club again for a finishing blow I bring my sword down on his side rendering a mortal blow before his club connects with my helmet one last time.

Before I make it half way up the pinalce the Aerolfos descend on me like a swarm of ravens. One darts trying to spear or cut me before retreating only for me to grab them and dash them against the ground, cut them, or bash them with my shield. This continues till I am out of breath before a red Aerolfos descends on me instead of bringing it's sword down on me it inhales and lets out a breath of fire. The heat is intense then seems to vanish only to be replaced by a cold I've never felt before.
After weeks I of scouting I find what looks like like a zuna trading caravan. A cluster of what look like dinolfos huts, and an encampment of Gerudo.
Killing the Gerudo will help the legion.
The dinolfos will surely put up a threat.
Zuna traders will either give me death or supplies.

As I aproach the Gerudo bandits I see sand being kicked up by what could only be horses. Before I see the riders arrows begin raining down upon me. Most bounce off of my armor but a couple find their mark in my sholders. As the horses get within site the bandits dismount not wishing to injure their prized mounts. With an oath I charge.

I sit among the remains of the bandits my armor discarded around the sand. My wounds stay unbound as more of the bandits arrive no longer worrying about their horses. I stand with my short sword in hand.
As I awaken this morning I feel my illness pass as if it never happened.
Before my eyes my wound closes up leaving behind a small scar which then starts to fade.

For days I've felt an exhaustion unlike anything I have ever felt before. My once green leaves have started turning colors. My bark has started graying. I believe it will be a matter of time before my life ends.
All but one of my leaves have fallen the only. It is about all I can do to keep my eyes open.

I have my supplies ready, my skin paints for camoflauge, my potions, lockpicks, and food. The only thing I need to do now is decide where am I going. The castles and keeps of the nobles will surely give me good treasure, but it will be more dangerous. I can steal from the village, there is more people and less things to steal, but they aren't as heavily armed. I could always steal from travelers, but I will have no idea what I get.
The riches of the keeps are to tempting
I'm less likely to lose my tail in the village
Travelers may give me the best items
I'm at my destination and ready to steal.
Lets get a looting
However there is a war and I must return
My crime spree is at an end and I must put my loot bag aside till the heat dies down.
I've been staking out one keep there's a couple of entrances, a delivery entrance, a fountain entrance.
I can disguise myself as a box and get in through the delivery.
I'm sure I can swim through the fountain in take
Scaling the wall should be easy
Maybe another mark

I waited till next day's delivery and snuck into one of the potion crates, I tossed most of the potions out along the road. When we arrived the guard complained about the weight but he still put me down with the rest of the crates.

I waited till next day's delivery and snuck into one of the potion crates, I tossed most of the potions out along the road. When we arrived the guard complained about the weight. He brought me about halfway when he set me down. I heard a comotion and then the lid of my crate open.
Don't move a muscle
SCAMPER!
The guard fishes around with his hand barrely missing me. In the end he grumbles puts the lid back on and takes me in.

The guard fishes around with his hand barrely missing me. He removes his hand and then a flair of pain and something hot running down my abdomen. As the voices rise around me I come to the realization I had been stabbed.
I guess my crime spree is over.

I bolted the guards yelled and a couple stumbled, but one with his bow at the ready fired. The arrow hit me right in the chest. The clouds are above me now and the sun beaming down on. Just like sunning on the beach.
The tunnel to the garden fount was longer than I thought, but I was able to find the end just as the guard walked by.

The tunnel to the garden fountain is longer than I thought. The light at the end seems to keep getting smaller and smaller. My lungs burn for air and panic sets. I need air. NOW. I take in a deep breath but only water enters my lungs. Everything is dark. The light gone.
The tunnel to the garden fountain is longer than I thought. I come up but right at the waters edge I see a guard staring in the water.
Must not move
Swim back
I can't make it back to the moat. My lungs burn. I need to take a breath.
I'm IN
I'm in the castle. The only question is where do I go. I could search the servents quarters, the guards quarters, or the noble's quarters.
The servents are the safest.
The guards can give me great weapons my people can't make.
The noble quarters will surely give me great gifts.
As I enter the sevents quarters I over hear a servent talking about another that had been acting suspicious. I quickly spot said servent leaving his quarters and heading for the delivery area.
I'll follow him this may have good loot
No, I won't waste time on a rumor.

After following the servent for serveral minutes he sits and waits for what seems like ages in the delivery bay. As I'm getting ready to give up a woman enters wearing a rich dress. After a few minutes it becomes apparent the liege's daughter is sleeping with a servent.
A waste of time.
I follow the servent for a while I watch as he puts something in under a stone in the delivery room.
Lets see what he left

Inside the dead drop is a letter. It describes a burning passion for a woman. I hear footsteps coming from behind and quickly place the letter back and go back to the shadows. A older woman in a rich dress enters and retreves the letter depositing another letter.
Looks like someone is having an affair
As the sun gets ready to rise I leave the castle with a small sack of rupees. My winnings from pickpocketing and stealing the servents meager pay
It's not much
As the sun gets ready to rise I leave the castle with a small sack of rupees. My winnings from stealing from the guards earnings.
There is a rumor that one of the guards is seeing someone, but for some reason he doesn't want anyone to know.
Is he seeing someone or hidding something?

As I follow the guard he acts like he is patrolling the grounds but he quickly diverts and heads for the servents quarters. He enters a room close to the kitchens after a short period of eavs dropping I gather enough he his in a relationship with the head chef's daughter.
This may be valuble if I was a spymaster

As I follow the guard he acts as if he is on a patrol but quickly leaves the castle. After a few minutes of walking we come to a clearing. In the center is the body of another guard with a note still in his fist. The living guard begins digging a grave but I quickly distract him by making noise in the opposite direction causing him to run.
I quickly descend on the body looking for equipment.

As I descend on the body I hear a twig snap and a sharp pain in my stomatch, I look down as someone right behind me starts yelling for the guards. I fall on the body with the sword still in my stomach....the sound of both of our murderer franticly running back to the castle.
As I make my way through the guard quarters one a pass guard stops and then continues on.
Remain in hidding.
Make a break for it
As I emerge from my hidding place the world goes black. The distant sound of heavy foot steps growing ever closer is all I can hear.
As the sun begins to rise I exit the castle my large bag of rupees ove my shoulder and a smile on my face.
A good haul
As I enter the noble quarters I notice a child in rich clothes running with something clutched in his hands.
He may lead me to a good find
A child with a toy no doubt

As I follow the child he repeatedly looks behind as if he is worried to be followed. He enters a room containing a girl close to his age equally dressed. They proceed to play together with a set of dolls.
A waste of time.

As I follow the child he repeatedly looks behind as if he is worried about being followed. He nears a door and unlocks it. As he exits I pick the keys from him and enter. Revealing a large room filled with armor and valuble rupees.The only question is.....what do I take.
The armor
The bow
The sword
Wanted posters of me are up all over town. Guard patrols are everywhere.
I need to lay low till the heat dies down

I ran into one of my fellow thievies. He said that he tried to break into a manor that was said to have a lot of treasures just laying around. He said that he scouted it out and would be willing to give me his map for 20 rupees.
It may be worth it.
Safe journey home, but no thanks.

The map is very well detailed, but only has the outside. It shows an entrance through a old hidden passage which has been bricked up, but the passage has be taken over bay keese. There's a window in the library, the owner of the house usually in there till midnight and is very lightly guarded.
The passage should be quickest.
The library may be the safest

The passage was luckily devoid of keese, probably out feeding on someone's cucco. As I neared the bricked up wall the only sound was my footsteps. I removed the bricks slowly being sure not to make any unneeded sound, after I made it in I put the bricks back.
The passage was luckily devoid of keese, probably out feeding on someone's cucco. As I neared the bricked up wall I hear a couple of hushed voices.
I can either wait for them to leave
or take my chances and go inside.
As I entered the cave it quickly became apparent that the keese are still in the cave. There is enough keese on the ceiling that would be sure to ensure my death within seconds.
Douse my torch and try to make my way through the tunnel
I should wait for the keese to leave then try again
I should try the library entrance
Scalling the manor's wall was easy. As I neared the window I can hear snoring. A quick glance shows the master of the house asleep at a study desk and countless artifacts.
I could take my chances and sneak in
Or give up.
The sound of wings is all I can ear and the glow of hundreds of pairs of eyes are all I can see. Before the keese descend on me.

As I carefully removed the stones the sound of wings came from behind, picking up the pace I entered the celler and took cover. Just in time as a swarm of keese descend on the couple, their screams ring through the manor.
A black mark
After gaining entrance I have scouted the manor. Then in the celler there is a locked door. There is the library with the sleeping owner, it has enough small artifacts that I can make a large profit.
The armor can either be of use or profit.
There must be something behind that door.
The library's artifacts can be profitable.
The owner of the house continues to snore. After a quick survey I find the four easiest and most valuble artifacts. However the owner has a large key on his belt.
Grab the artifacts and leave.
The key may open the door.
As the key comes off the owner's belt a servent walks in. She screams and I run.
If I survive I'll need to lay low
As I run the sound of hounds and guards grow ever closer. Before I relize what happened my face is on the ground.
As I near the door I find lightly guarded, being passed every 5 minutes. The door is locked by a large key, the hole located in the center. I may be able to unlock it or I may find the key.
I'll try to pick the lock
I'll try to find the key
Inside the room is a single blue chest and some books all not very valuble.
Inside the chest is a single silver rupee
Inside the chest is two silver rupees
Inside the chest is a single large golden rupee
After several lock pics it becomes apparent I may not be able to unlock it.
Grats you broke the game
column3: Grats vous avez cassé le jeu
column6: Grats que se rompió el juego

column2: I awaken this morning to find that the mark of the triforce on my hand had disappeared with no explanation.
column3: Je me réveille ce matin pour constater que la marque de la triforce sur ma main avait disparu sans explication .
column4: Ich erwache heute Morgen zu finden , dass die Marke des triforce auf meiner Hand ohne Erklärung verschwunden war.
column6: Me despierto esta mañana para encontrar que la marca de la Trifuerza en mi mano había desaparecido sin explicación .

column2: What have I done to deserve this!
column4: Was habe ich getan, um das zu verdienen!

column2: Form Triforce
With all fragments of the Triforce in my possession it is time to unite them and form the reform the Triforce.
column3: Avec tous les fragments de la Triforce en ma possession , il est temps de les réunir et de former la réforme de la Triforce .
column4: Bei allen Fragmente des Triforce in meinem Besitz ist es Zeit, sie zu vereinen und die Reform der triforce bilden.
column6: Con todos los fragmentos de la Trifuerza en mi poder es el momento de unirlos y formar la reforma de la Trifuerza .

column2: It is time for the Triforce to be whole again
column3: Il est temps pour la Triforce soit à nouveau ensemble
column4: Es ist Zeit für das Triforce zu sein wieder ganz
column6: Es hora de que la Trifuerza para ser de nuevo todo

column2: I'll just go ahead and make a wish.
column3: Je vais aller de l'avant et faire un souhait.
column4: Ich gehe einfach weiter und machen Sie einen Wunsch .
column6: Voy a seguir adelante y hacer un deseo.

column2: The time isn't right to form the Triforce
column3: Il ne convient pas de former la Triforce
column4: Es ist nicht richtig, das Triforce zu bilden
column6: El tiempo no es el adecuado para formar la Trifuerza

column2: In a flash of light the three markings on my hand vanishes only for a golden triangle made of the three pieces appear before my eyes
column3: Dans un éclair de lumière les trois marques sur ma main disparaît que pour un triangle d'or en trois morceaux comparaître devant mes yeux
column4: In einem Lichtblitz die drei Markierungen auf meiner Hand verschwindet nur für ein goldenes Dreieck aus den drei Stücke erscheinen vor meinen Augen
column6: En un destello de luz las tres marcas en mi mano desaparece sólo por un triángulo de oro hecho de las tres piezas aparecer ante mis ojos

column2: Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
Triforce Wish
column3: Triforce Wish Needs to Be translated
column4: Triforce Wish Needs to Be translated
column6: Triforce Wish Needs to Be translated

column2: I place my hand on the Triforce and say "I wish....
...to be the richest person in all the lands."
...M-o-o-n that spells smarter."
...to be strong."
...to be beautiful."
...wait, I need more time to decide."
In a flash the Triforce vanishes. As my vision clears I find 3 hylian sized orange rupees.
I will never need to worry about rupees again!
In a flash the Triforce vanishes. I feel as if a fog has been cleared from my mind.
T-R-I-F-O-R-C-E that spells Triforce.
In a flash the Triforce vanishes. I feel my muscles tensing and taking shape.
I feel like I could defeat a Legion of Darknuts by myself.
In a flash the Triforce vanishes. I feel no different till a maid walks in and starts to blush.
I must truly be beutiful.
